mapper.select: select u.user_num, u.nick, u.img, b.conts, b.reg_date as brd_reg_date from challenge c1 , challenger c2 , user1 u , (select * from board b1 where b1.brd_lg = 700 and b1.brd_md = 100 ) b where c1.chg_id = #{chg_id} and c1.chg_id = c2.chg_id and c2.user_num = u.user_num and c1.chg_id = b.chg_id and u.user_num = b.user_num order by b.reg_date desc
